pages.text:
Without cobblestone to create a furnace, you are limited in what you can do. Thankfully, your $(item)campfire/$ is here to help!$(p)You can break it to get 2 $(item)charcoal/$, using which you can create additional campfires, or $(item)torches/$. Another use for it is drying your $(item)kelp/$ for some rudimentary food, but it turns out this also has other interesting uses ...$(br)              $(t:16x Charcoal
16x Dried Kelp)$(bold)[Requirements]/$

pages.title: Drying Kelp
pages.text: Unfortunately, this modpack does not have sushi.
